description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-43646) in the Windows secure kernel mode, perform the following steps:

1. Identify the appropriate KB updates for your Windows version:
   - Windows 11 Version 24H2: KB5046617
   - Windows 11 Version 23H2: KB5046633
   - Windows 11 Version 22H2: KB5046633
   - Windows 10 Version 22H2: KB5046613
   - Windows 10 Version 21H2: KB5046613
   - Windows 10 Version 22H2 (32-bit): KB5046613
   - Windows 10 Version 21H2 (32-bit): KB5046613

2. Download and install the relevant KB update from the Microsoft Update Catalog using the links below:
   - [KB5046617](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046617)
   - [KB5046633](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046633)
   - [KB5046613](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046613)

3. Restart your system to apply the changes.

**Details**:
This update addresses an untrusted pointer dereference issue, allowing local attackers to exploit the vulnerability to gain elevated privileges. Ensure your system is updated to the latest supported build for optimal security. Backup data before applying updates.
